  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Launcher L, ArrayList<Player> lobby)
      Constructor used when server starts a new game
      Parameters:
      L - launcher to pass to the game checker
      lobby - of players that are part of the game

      lobby - of players that are part of the game

    • playMove

      public GameSavings playMove(ArrayList<Integer> commands, Integer column, ArrayList<Integer> order)
      Parameters:
      commands - array list that contains the coordinates of the tiles the player want to extract
      column - where the player wants to put the extracted tiles in his bookshelf
      order - of the tiles he wants to insert
      Returns:
      the GameSavings to store for the persistence advanced function

    • endGame

      public ArrayList<Player> endGame()
      Returns:
      the player with the highest score

    • checkLegalMove

      public boolean checkLegalMove(ArrayList<Integer> coordinates, int size)
      Parameters:
      coordinates - of the tiles the player wants to extract
      size - number of tiles the player wants to extract
      Returns:
      true if the player selected legal tiles from the living room

    • checkLegalColumn

      public boolean checkLegalColumn(int column, int numOfTiles)
      Parameters:
      column - to check
      numOfTiles - the player wants to put in that column
      Returns:
      true if the Bookshelf column has at least numOfTiles space to put tiles
